channel.title: Hugo Starter Template using TailwindCSS
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Starter Template using TailwindCSS

item.title: Intro
item.description: Integrating Hugo with TailwindCSS You want to start your own blog and don’t know much about web development. Then you’re at the point where I was a couple of months ago. Building a blog using a static site generator seems to be the most popular choice right now. There are many static site generators available, so go with one of them. My choice is hugo, so let’s set it up!
